name: Beep Beep (Flokami)
description:
Travel into paradisiacal environments and between what we struggle about every days, driving. Play a mindy game onto the roads and don't get tricked by the traffic.

------------------------------------------------

How to play ?

Click onto the player to add actions.

Click onto the other cars and actors to see theirs movements.

- Right arrow for next turn

- Left arrow for previous

- Space to autoplay
